content:
I'm so thrilled to hear that! "Schitt's Creek" is an amazing show, and it's not surprising that you devoured it in just two weeks! It's a show that's hard to put down, with its lovable characters, witty humor, and heartwarming storylines.

I think you'll find that "Shrill" has a similar feel-good quality to it, although it tackles some different themes and has a more satirical tone. But both shows share a common thread of being character-driven, relatable, and ultimately uplifting.

If you need any more recommendations or just want to chat about your thoughts on "Schitt's Creek" or "Shrill," I'm always here to chat! Enjoy your binge-watching adventure, and I hope you find many more shows that bring you joy and laughter!
